alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:07AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Dickinson, Delta, northeastern Menominee, Marquette, southwestern Schoolcraft, southeastern Baraga and Alger Counties through 645 AM EDT/545 AM CDT/... At 607 AM EDT/507 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Three Lakes to 6 miles southeast of Powers. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marquette, Escanaba, Ishpeming, Manistique, Munising, Miners Castle, Presque Isle, Chapel Lake, Grand Island, Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, Gladstone, Negaunee, Watson, Rapid River, Au Train, Nahma, Powers, Michigamme, Champion and Garden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
